mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM mdm_instr a
a.del_flag = '0'
and a.name LIKE concat('%', #{name},'%')
and a.code LIKE concat('%', #{code},'%')
order by a.create_time desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mdm_instr( id, code, name, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, remark, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{code}, #{name}, #{createUser}, #{createTime}, #{updateUser}, #{updateTime}, #{remarks}, #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} )
